:Buttons:

.button
  $w: 200px
  $h: 53px
  $border_w: 1px
  $border_r: 3px 

  &.big-btn
    +button_draw($w, $h, $border_w, $r)
    +button_fonts($MAIN_FONT_BOLD, 18px)

<div class="button big-btn">
  <button<span>Text</span></button>
</div>
.button
  $w: 155px
  $h: 44px
  $border_w: 2px
  $border_r: 5px

  &.medium-btn
    +button_draw($w, $h, $border_w, $r)
    +button_fonts($MAIN_FONT_MEDIUM, 16px)

<div class="button medium-btn">
  <button<span>Text</span></button>
</div>
.button.big-btn

  <button<span>Text</span></button>
</div>

  <button<span>Text</span></button>
</div>

:Labels:

</div>
